adversary_kill_chains.name: Reconnaissance
adversary_kill_chains.description: Adversaries gathering information they can use to plan future operations.

adversary_kill_chains.name: Weaponization
adversary_kill_chains.description: Adversaries creating remote access malware weapon, such as a virus or worm, tailored to one or more vulnerabilities.

adversary_kill_chains.name: Delivery
adversary_kill_chains.description: Adversaries transmitting the weapon to the targeted environment.

adversary_kill_chains.name: Exploitation
adversary_kill_chains.description: Adversaries exploiting a vulnerability to execute code on a target system.

adversary_kill_chains.name: Installation
adversary_kill_chains.description: Adversaries installing a remote access tool on a target system.

adversary_kill_chains.name: Command and Control
adversary_kill_chains.description: Adversaries controlling the system remotely by establishing a command and control channel.

adversary_kill_chains.name: Actions on Objectives
adversary_kill_chains.description: Adversaries taking actions to achieve their objectives on the target system.
